# README Guidelines

> Checklist and template for crafting professional GitHub READMEs with badges, structure, and LLM-ready documentation.

## About

A living reference for writing beautiful, well-structured GitHub READMEs. Covers centered headers, Shields.io badges (for-the-badge style), taglines, blockquote concepts, feature tables, collapsible sections, ASCII file trees, contributing guidelines, roadmaps, and license formatting. Includes an LLM-optimized reference file for AI-assisted README generation.

- Author: [Maxim Osovsky](https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q107189449)
